Name: Total 15
About the game: Challenge your problem-solving skills in this game. Each round consists of 9 numbers and the sum of them has to be equal vertically and horizontally. You must finish the challenge before the end time. You can track the total number of moves made. With virtually infinite levels, random commands, and an easy-to-use interface, the Total 15 can become a time challenge.
